edge: The biopic 'Shershaah' is based on the life of Captain Vikram Batra.
The Batra family wanted Sidharth Malhotra to play the role of Captain Vikram Batra in the biopic 'Shershaah'.
Sidharth Malhotra was selected to portray the role of Captain Vikram Batra in the biopic 'Shershaah'.
The Batra family wanted Sidharth Malhotra to play Captain Vikram Batra in the biopic 'Shershaah'.
Several actresses, including Dimple Cheema, were in discussions to play Batra's fiancée in the biopic 'Shershaah'. Kiara Advani was eventually cast.
Batra's fiancée in the biopic 'Shershaah' is played by Kiara Advani, who replaced Dimple Cheema.
In the biopic 'Shershaah', Sidharth Malhotra portrays both Captain Vikram Batra and his identical twin brother, Vishal.
